revised_title: Maricultural Technologies: Perspectives and Developments in the 1990s
tldr: This article discusses the advancements and potential of maricultural technologies in shellfish and fish farming during the 1990s. It highlights the importance of the mass production of brine shrimp Artemia in extensive and intensive operations and its role in vertically integrated aquaculture. The article also emphasizes the need for improvements in biological, technical, and economic aspects to increase the efficiency of aquacultural food production.
